long_description: Designed for the trail, the Gregory Miwok 24 Pack does everything a daypack should and more. It has ample capacity for all-day excursions, plus an expanding front pocket for bulky items. Interior organization and clean exterior lines allow it to function as a commuting or carry-on pack during the work week. BioSync suspension mimics your own flexible joints, helping keep your movement fluid and natural as it distributes the load. Zippered main compartment with 2 internal mesh organizer pockets; zippered accessory pocket with internal security pocket. Hydration sleeve with external access (reservoir sold separately). The Gregory Miwok 24 Pack features an expandable stretch front pocket with tuck-away bungee closure that fits helmets. Dual external side pockets; dual quick-access waist belt pockets; side compression straps; hydration tube clip and sunglasses loop on the shoulder straps.
short_description: Designed for the trail, the Gregory Miwok 24 Pack does everything a daypack should and more. It has ample capacity for all-day excursions, plus an expanding front pocket for bulky items.
